reuters.title: BROADVIEW FINANCIAL CORP <BDVF> 4TH QTR LOSS
reuters.body: Shr loss 5.67 dlrs vs loss 5.17 dlrs Net loss 17 mln vs loss 15.4 mln Year Shr loss 12.42 dlrs vs loss 9.60 dlrs Net loss 37.0 mln vs loss 28.5 mln NOTE: 1986 4th qtr and year net includes 11.9 mln dlr and 43.8 mln dlr provision, respectively, for possible land and real estate losses. 1985 4th qtr and year net includes 5.1 mln dlr and 13.4 mln dlr provision, respectively, for possible losses.
